name: Gaia's Decision
description:
In this turn-based strategy game, you will develop and direct a virus.
You must evolve it carefully and give strategic decisions for specific situations.

“Year 2080.

The consumption frenzy of the early century is being paid.

The planet's resources are running out. There is a serious drought problem in the world. Many species disappeared, glaciers melted, desertification increased, and many cities flooded. As countries clash with each other for a small number of resources, people migrate in masses to survive.

A mysterious scientist whose code name is Gaia knows that life on the world is about to end. From his point of view and philosophy, planet Earth was a living creature. But now it’s dying. Just as there are organic systems in the human body, animals and plants were organic systems in the world.

What we have not been aware of for thousands of years is that we are a threat to the health of this planet. We had infinite potential, but humanity chose to be a cancer cell for this planet.

Dr. Gaia has decided to eliminate this threat. He developed a deadly virus that would only affect the human race.“
